display_long_description:
An arcade cyberpunk VR action shooter. Try all the insane guns in one go: shoot, throw, pick another one. Cast spectacular spells. Fight badass bosses and be badass yourself. Even deflect death rays with trash can lids!
# Disposable Guns
Shoot them, throw in the enemies’ faces, grab the next ones.
# Badass Weapons
Destroy enemies with flamethrowers, void cannons, shotguns, katanas with death energy waves, and other cool weaponry.
# Arsenal of Spells
There is offensive, protective and supportive magic for all possible cases. Fireballs, frost rays, void shields and telekinesis are just a small part of it.
# Epic Bosses
Three precisely-crafted challenging multi-stage encounters. Face Mother Drone with her death ray, tough Crystal Elemental, and colossal Rift Titan.
# Immersive Action
Protect the alarm button. Hack the computer while shooting. Keep an eye on the conveyor belts. Every arena throws fresh twists your way – stay ready.
# Gang Hordes
Splatter waves of bandits, corpos, droids, and warlocks across the walls. Don’t let their coordinated strikes, busted abilities, or sheer numbers overwhelm you.
# Fun Adventure
Leap into an on-rails cyber-magic shooter. A chatty sidekick stuck in a drone shell, corporate sorcerers, and nonstop insanity await. Go raise havoc!
